title: Rajalakshmi Kundan Haaram: Ruby & Polki Diamond Grandeur
materials: Natural Burmese Rubies. Features Hyderabadi Polish for enduring luster.
features: Elaborately crafted Kundan setting showcasing the natural brilliance of Polki diamonds. Features a regal layered design with ruby accents. The 'Kundan' work is meticulously handcrafted, creating a traditional yet modern appeal. Intricate detailing on the reverse side adds to the craftsmanship. The symmetrical design speaks of balance and harmony, key elements of South Indian jewelry.
colors: and Sparkling White (Polki Diamonds) creating a vibrant and auspicious combination.
occasions: and other grand celebrations. Ideal bridal jewelry. Also suitable for a red-carpet event when paired with the right attire. Suitable for Seemantham and Half-Saree Functions.
description: Authentic Hyderabadi craftsmanship blending traditional techniques with modern design sensibilities. The use of high-quality Polki diamonds and Burmese rubies guarantees exceptional sparkle and enduring value. Symbolically auspicious colors and design make it a cherished heirloom. A statement piece that embodies grace, tradition, and timeless beauty. The unique Polki cut captures light beautifully, ensuring you'll be the center of attention.
